publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3282 Malcolm Chisholm: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (Scotland) Order 2002 (SSI 2002/345)-That the Health and Community Care Committee, in consideration of the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (Scotland) Order 2002 (SSI 2002/345), recommends that the Order be approved. Supported by: Mr Frank McAveety*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
